entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
